panels.description: Total number of applications in our database (each id is a individual loan application)

targets.rawSql: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM bankloandb.bankloan LIMIT 50

panels.title: Total Number of Applications

targets.rawSql: select sum(loan_amount) as total_funded_ammount from bankloan

panels.description: Amount that have been received back after giving the loan over entire year

targets.rawSql: select sum(total_payment) as total_received_amount from bankloan

panels.title: Panel Title

targets.rawSql: SELECT ROUND(AVG(int_rate) * 100, 2) FROM bankloandb.bankloan
select round(avg(dti)*100, 5) as average_debt_to_income_ratio from bankloan
select count(id) as total_loan_application from bankloan where month(issue_date) = 12 and year(issue_date) = 2021

select (count(id) - (select count(id) as total_loan_application from bankloan where month(issue_date) = 11 and year(issue_date) = 2021)) / (select count(id) as total_loan_application from bankloan where month(issue_date) = 11 and year(issue_date) = 2021) * 100 as mom_percentage from bankloan where month(issue_date) = 12 and year(issue_date) = 2021
select sum(loan_amount) as total_funded_amount from bankloan where month(issue_date) = 12 and year(issue_date) = 2021

select (sum(loan_amount) - (select sum(loan_amount) as total_funded_amount from bankloan where month(issue_date) = 11 and year(issue_date) = 2021)) / (select sum(loan_amount) as total_funded_amount from bankloan where month(issue_date) = 11 and year(issue_date) = 2021) * 100 as mom_percentage from bankloan where month(issue_date) = 12 and year(issue_date) = 2021
select sum(total_payment) as total_received_amount from bankloan where month(issue_date) = 12 and year(issue_date) = 2021

select (sum(total_payment) - (select sum(total_payment) as total_received_amount from bankloan where month(issue_date) = 11 and year(issue_date) = 2021)) / (select sum(total_payment) as total_received_amount from bankloan where month(issue_date) = 11 and year(issue_date) = 2021) * 100 as mom_percentage from bankloan where month(issue_date) = 12 and year(issue_date) = 2021
select round(avg(int_rate) * 100, 5) as average_interest_rate from bankloan where month(issue_date) = 12 and year(issue_date) = 2021

select (round(avg(int_rate) * 100, 5) - (select round(avg(int_rate) * 100, 5) as average_interest_rate from bankloan where month(issue_date) = 11 and year(issue_date) = 2021)) / (select round(avg(int_rate) * 100, 5) as average_interest_rate from bankloan where month(issue_date) = 11 and year(issue_date) = 2021) * 100 as mom_percentage from bankloan where month(issue_date) = 12 and year(issue_date) = 2021
select round(avg(dti)*100, 5) as average_debt_to_income_ratio from bankloan where month(issue_date) = 12 and year(issue_date) = 2021

select (round(avg(dti), 5) - (select round(avg(dti), 5) as average_debt_to_income_ratio from bankloan where month(issue_date) = 11 and year(issue_date) = 2021)) / (select round(avg(dti), 5) as average_debt_to_income_ratio from bankloan where month(issue_date) = 11 and year(issue_date) = 2021) * 100 as mom_percentage from bankloan where month(issue_date) = 12 and year(issue_date) = 2021
select month(issue_date) as month, round(avg(int_rate) * 100, 5) as average_interest_rate from bankloan group by month(issue_date) order by month(issue_date)

select
   month(issue_date) as month,
   round(avg(dti), 5) as average_debt_to_income_ratio
from bankloan
group by month(issue_date)
order by month(issue_date)

panels.description: This Shows the Trend of the number of people applying for loans

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
   MONTH(issue_date) AS month,
   MONTHNAME(issue_date) AS month_name, 
   COUNT(id) AS total_loan_applications
FROM bankloan
GROUP BY MONTH(issue_date), MONTHNAME(issue_date)
ORDER BY MONTH(issue_date)

panels.title: Total Loan Applications

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
   address_state,
   COUNT(id) AS total_loan_applications
FROM bankloan
GROUP BY address_state

panels.description: Number of people categorized based on time period of the loan
panels.title: Loan Applied Based on Term

panels.description: Loan applications categorized based on purpose of category by each individual.
panels.title: Purpose OfLoan

panels.description: Number of people categorized based on how much time they were in the job market i.e the earning folks
panels.title: Working People

panels.description: Number of people who have take good loans that is their current loan status is either fully paid or else they are paying regularly

targets.rawSql: select count(case when loan_status = "Fully Paid" or loan_status = "Current" then id end) as good_loan_application from bankloan

panels.title: Good Loan Applicants

targets.rawSql: select (count(case when loan_status = "Fully Paid" or loan_status = "Current" then id end)*100) / count(id) as good_loan_percentage from bankloan
select (count(case when loan_status = "Charged Off" then id end)*100) / count(id) as bad_loan_percentage from bankloan

panels.description: The amount of people who's loans has been charge off which means people who failed to pay the loans regulary

targets.rawSql: select count(case when loan_status = "Charged Off" then id end) as good_loan_application from bankloan

panels.title: Bad Loan Applicants

panels.description: The amount of money that has been taken from the Bank by the people under the category of good loan

targets.rawSql: select sum(case when loan_status = "Fully Paid" or loan_status = "Current" then loan_amount end) as good_loan_funded_amount from bankloan

panels.title: Funded Amount

panels.description: The amount of money that the bank has given to the people under the bad loan category

targets.rawSql: select sum(case when loan_status = "Charged Off" then loan_amount end) as good_loan_funded_amount from bankloan

panels.title: Funded Amount

panels.description: The amount of money that has been paid back with the interest to the Bank from the people under the good loan category

targets.rawSql: select sum(case when loan_status = "Fully Paid" or loan_status = "Current" then total_payment end) as good_loan_funded_amount from bankloan

panels.title: Received Amount

panels.description: The amount of money that has been finally retrieved from the people under the bad loan category

targets.rawSql: select sum(case when loan_status = "Charged Off" then total_payment end) as good_loan_funded_amount from bankloan

panels.title: Received Amount
